name: 2024 The 8th International Conference on System Reliability and Safety
content: Publication: All accepted papers must be written in English and will be published into ICSRS 2024 Conference Proceedings. The Conference content will be submitted for inclusion into IEEE Xplore as well as other Abstracting and Indexing (A&I) databases.The proceedings is expected to be indexed by Scopus & EI Compendex, etc
